name: Googass
description: This is a sci-fi RPG type game inspired by things such as Final Fantasy and Die Hard. It is a party based RPG maker game with 7 playable characters. It is about a Corporation that is destroying the planet by trying to control all of the magical crystals that were meant to keep the planet healthy. It is about 4 hours long, and there are over fifty maps in the game. There's a decent amount of boss fights, and they all require a unique set of strategies to defeat!
